Subject: Clarification on Graph description tile
Description:
We generated a healthcheck report and noticed a legend that says:
"RESTRICTEDTOUSER
The permission described above is restricted to Users."

However, we cannot find any details about this in the ACL for the object, and when this legend appears, the corresponding privilege is not visible in the ACL.

Could we please get clarification on why this legend appears and how we can view it in the ACL of the object?
What_We_Know__c: If a privilege is marked as "RESTRICTEDTOUSER," it might mean that the raw ACL contains permissions that apply only when a user interacts with the object
Next_Steps__c: awaiting screenshots of permissions of said object and the health check report
Solution_Comment__c: If a privilege is marked as "RESTRICTEDTOUSER," it might mean that the raw ACL contains permissions that apply only when a user interacts with the object
